"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor: This song represents determination and the drive to overcome challenges, which is essential in achieving success and fulfilling your goals.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey: This song encourages perseverance and not giving up on your dreams, even when the road ahead seems impossible.
"Roar" by Katy Perry: This song is about finding your inner strength and courage to overcome obstacles and make a difference in the world.
"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen: This song is about finding meaning and purpose in life, and celebrating the journey of self-discovery.
"The Power of Love" by Ro: This song reminds us of the importance of love and connection in our lives, and how it can bring us joy and fulfillment.
